page.title: 16Employment In Sparham
page.content: The population of Sparham is approx- imately 350, of these 35 are children, including 3 expected babies. Of those employed, about half get their income from work in or around the village, of the rest some travel to various RAF stations in the district some are taken 5 miles daily by coach to Great Witchingham Hall where they are employed by Bernard Matthews PLC, world famous turkey breeders and processors. The remainder work in Norwich or other small towns in the district. About one quarter of the people living in Sparham are retired; this quiet area of Norfolk in the Wensum valley attracts many over 60's from London and other areas to invest in property and settle down to enjoy a pleasant retirement.
